alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Harrison; Mercer; Putnam; Sullivan; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 8:07AM CDT until July 12 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Worth County in northwestern Missouri... Northern Grundy County in north central Missouri... Northwestern Sullivan County in north central Missouri... Mercer County in north central Missouri... Western Putnam County in north central Missouri... Harrison County in north central Missouri... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 807 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Leon to near Lamoni to near Grant City, moving southeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Princeton, Ridgeway, Mercer, Eagleville, Cainsville, Spickard, Irena, Lineville, Blythedale, Newtown, Pollock, Mount Moriah, Lucerne, Tindall, Harris, Powersville, Allendale, Pleasanton, Osgood and South Lineville. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 97 and 114. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Grundy; Harrison; Mercer; Putnam; Sullivan; Worth
